code: import axios from'axios';const API='/api/routines';const routineTemplateService={getTemplates:()=>axios.get(`${API}/templates`,{headers:{'x-auth-token':localStorage.getItem('token')}}),createTemplate:data=>axios.post(`${API}/templates`,data,{headers:{'x-auth-token':localStorage.getItem('token')}}),assignTemplate:data=>axios.post(`${API}/assign`,data,{headers:{'x-auth-token':localStorage.getItem('token')}}),getAssignments:()=>axios.get(`${API}/assignments`,{headers:{'x-auth-token':localStorage.getItem('token')}}),updateAssign:(id,data)=>axios.put(`${API}/assign/${id}`,data,{headers:{'x-auth-token':localStorage.getItem('token')}})};export default routineTemplateService;
